nodes.name: DarknodePaymentStore

nodes.documentation:
@notice The contract constructor.

    /// @param _VERSION A string defining the contract version.
@notice Allow direct ETH payments to be made to the DarknodePaymentStore.

nodes.name: totalBalance
availableBalance
incrementDarknodeBalance
transfer
DarknodePaymentStore

nodes.documentation:
@notice The contract constructor.

    /// @param _VERSION A string defining the contract version.
@notice Allow direct ETH payments to be made to the DarknodePaymentStore.

nodes.name: totalBalance
availableBalance
incrementDarknodeBalance
transfer

params._token: The token to check balance of

availableBalance(address).return: The available balance of the contract

params._VERSION: A string defining the contract version.

params._amount: The amount that the balance should be incremented by
params._darknode: The address of the darknode to increase balance of
params._token: The token which the balance should be incremented

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._token: The token to check balance of

totalBalance(address).return: The total balance of the contract

params._recipient: The address to withdraw it to

availableBalance(address).notice: Get the available balance of the contract for a particular token         This is the free amount which has not yet been allocated to         darknodes.

incrementDarknodeBalance(address,address.notice: Increments the amount of funds allocated to a particular         darknode.

totalBalance(address).notice: Get the total balance of the contract for a particular token

transfer(address,address,uint256,address.notice: Transfers an amount out of balance to a specified address

userdoc.notice: DarknodePaymentStore is responsible for tracking balances which have         been allocated to the darknodes. It is also responsible for holding         the tokens to be paid out to darknodes.
